EmailTemplate.name: 12-03-20 HOS eWeekly Channel Newsletter.12-03-20 HOS eWeekly Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – Get NCRU Credit Just for Listening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
December 3, 2020 Listen to TechFest2020 Recordings and Get Credit in NCRU The TechFest 2020 presentations and recordings are now available on NCRU. If you missed any of the sessions from TechFest 2020 - no problem. You can now add the curriculum to your NCRU transcript.
You’ll get NCRU credit for listening to the recordings at your convenience. You can also download the PowerPoint presentations for future reference.
Follow these easy steps to add the TechFest 2020 content to your NCRU transcript:
- Login to NCRU - Locate the search text box (upper right) and type CURR82403. - Press Enter on your keyboard. - Select TechFest 2020 Presentations and Materials. - Click Open Curriculum. - Locate the session in the list and click Launch.
If you need help or have any questions, contact hospitalitytraining@ncr.com <[[mailto:hospitalitytraining@ncr.com]]>.
